column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Ramen is my go-to comfort food and since Jinya is much closer to me than Chinatown now
column2: I've gone here quite a few times over the past year. First - the parking is ridiculous. It's connected to a parking garage that is shared between several restaurants and 24 hour fitness. If you're lucky
column3: you can find parking juuuust as someone is about to leave. Their parking garage is also currently under construction....so you're s.o.l if you're coming during the dinner rush.
